content: Sana kumain ka na while reading this...
Always keep hydrated pls!!
Ikaw lang lagi love ko
I'm always looking forward to ur messages each time I wake up.
You don’t have to be perfect you're already perfect for me hehe
You always got it and nandito me lagi.
I love you more than ever.
Just always find ur way back to me.
With you, every challenge feels a little easier.
Love will always find its way back.
My love for you knows no bounds.
Every mistake is just another reason to hold you even closer.
Happiness is easy when I’m with you.
You are capable of the most amazing things.
Every day is a fresh start, and every day I choose you.
I can't wait to travel with you!
Taking care of yourself means I get to love you even longer.
You deserve all the love in the world—starting with mine.
Do what makes you happy, love, and I’ll be right here cheering for you.
Your hard work will pay off, and I’ll be there to celebrate every milestone with you.
